name: electrothermally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the production of heat from electricity: The electrodes are produced electrothermally at the new aluminium plants. Alloys used to be made electrothermally, but the process is no longer used.
More examplesFewer examplesElectrothermally generated bubbles are formed in the ink.This device allows more efficient vaporization of the sample than is possible in electrothermally heated furnaces. The alloy can be electrothermally produced.The sample was electrothermally heated.The graphite that is produced electrothermally is mechanically strong.
